description: '''Afro house''' (also written as '''Afro-house''' or '''Afrohouse''') is a [[Music subgenre|sub-genre]] of [[house music]] mainly developed in South Africa. The genre emerged in the 1990s. This musical style fuses elements of traditional [[House music|house]] with African rhythms and sounds, incorporating instruments such as the [[saxophone]], piano and [[synthesizer]]s, as well as vocals in various [[Languages of Africa|African languages]].
